price: Awoͻ ntoatoasoͻ dodoͻ sεn na Yasεe wͻn wͻ Noa akyi? Wo Wura Nyankopͻn som bo sε Ɔbͻ N’akoa bͻne a ͻyε ho amaneε, na N’ani tua biribiara.
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ نُوحٖۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā mina al-qurūni min baʿdi nūḥin wakafā birabbika bidhunūbi ʿibādihi khabīran baṣīran
